profile.name: @anhkhoadev
profile.title: Fullstack Developer (5 years)
profile.valueProposition: Developing full-cycle digital products that pair high-concurrency backend systems with optimized user journeys to fuel enterprise growth.

summary: Deep expertise in ASP.NET Core & Distributed Systems.
Proven track record in optimizing database performance.
Passionate about Clean Architecture & Domain-Driven Design.
Advanced proficiency in Angular, RxJS, and sophisticated State Management (NgRx/Signals).
Expertise in crafting high-performance, modular architectures with Standalone Components & Micro-frontends.

projects.name: E-Commerce Microservices Platform
projects.problem: Legacy monolith was unable to scale during peak traffic events.
impact: Reduced API latency by 40% via caching strategies.
Handled 10k+ concurrent users during Black Friday sales.
Decoupled order processing system, improving reliability to 99.9%.

projects.name: Real-time Logistics Tracker
projects.problem: Lack of visibility into fleet location caused delivery delays.
impact: Reduced customer support calls by 25% by providing self-service tracking.
Optimized route calculation algorithm, saving 15% fuel costs.

projects.name: Financial Reporting System
projects.problem: Slow generation of end-of-month reports (took 4+ hours).
impact: Optimized SQL queries to reduce report generation time to < 10 minutes.
Implemented automated background processing for heavy calculations.
Ensured 100% data accuracy across millions of transaction records.

description: Leading a team of 5 developers in migrating legacy .NET Framework apps to .NET 8.
Mentoring junior developers and establishing code quality standards.
Developed high-performance RESTful APIs for fintech applications.
Implemented comprehensive unit and integration testing strategies.
